title: JP Morgan | Software Engineer II | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.Tech 3rd Tier
Years of Experience: 3 
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at Product Based Startup in Bangalore, joined in 2021 after Graduation
Current Compensation: 24L Base + Esops ( Paper Money )

Date of the Offers: Sept '24
Company: JP Morgan
Title/Level: Software Engineer II
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 30L Fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 7-12 % of Base as per Performance
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 30L
Benefits: $1,100 for a WFH setup ( Hybrid, 3 Days WFO ) and standard other benefits.

Anyone from JPMorgan Chase Hyderabad can please provide valuable insights on work culture, career growth, and learning opportunities.  For me, work culture, career growth and learning are more important than salary.
Also, since my hometown is Hyderabad, no relocation is required.

I will post interview experience in coming weeks.

title: DE Shaw | SMT/SDET | Gurgaon
content:
Education: B.Tech
Years of Experience: 4 Years
Prior Experience: SE-2 at an Investment Bank
Curr Compensation: 25 LPA
Date of the Offer: Sep 2024
Company: DE Shaw
Title/Level: Senior Member,Tech (SMT)/SDET
Location: Gurgaon, India
Salary: ₹50 LPA
Signing Bonus: ₹500,000
Performance Bonus: ₹ 15-20 Lakh
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ₹ 70-75 Lakh

I have other offers. But De Shaw is the highest among all. Only concern for me right now is that they are giving kind of SDET role and saying that its not SDET but tech role. The profile Says Senior Memeber Tech in QTE (Quality & Test Engineering) team. But the description is of a testing role. 
I think it will later cause issue for me if I want to switch from SDE to SDET and then again to SDE. 
I did read the profile description before giving the interview but I gave it for fun just to check If I could clear it as they are very selective and have a very tough interview process. But somehow I cleared it, now seeing the Comp I am confused what to do.
Anyone from DEShaw can help if its worth taking the offer.

title: Phonepe | Software Engineer | Bengaluru
content:

Relocation/Signing Bonus: 50000
ESOPS:  6000000(vested in 4 years)
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 5300000 for first year (I dont count ESOPS in salary)
Benefits: Standard Phonepe Benefits
salaryTotal: : 5300000 For First Year (i Dont Count Esops In Salary)

title: Oracle Oci | IC3 | Declined
content:
Education: B Tech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 9.5
Prior Experience: Intuit
Date of the Offer: Jul 2024
Company: Oracle OCI
Title/Level: IC3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 43.5 L
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 4L + 4L
Stock bonus: $92K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~66.5 L
Other details: Interviewd for IC4 role. All the round went superb. They downleveled without given proper justification.

Final verdict: Decline the offer

title: Atlassian| P4 | Remote/Bangalore
content:
- Education: BE in CS from Top 10 CS schools
- Years of Experience: 3
- Current Company: FAANG 
- Current TC: 62 LPA
- Title/Level: P4
- Location: WFH
- Base: Rs ~44L
- Stock: $114K stock grant vested over 4 years
- Annual Bonus: max 15% 
- Joining bonus: ~8L
Total Comp: ~78 L for first year
Had competing offers from Google, Uber and Cred. This was the max they were willing to offer.
